Setting things up:
```{r}
rm(list=ls())
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggfortify)
```

Importing the data:
```{r}
DF <- read.csv(here("Data", "biostats_copepod_data.csv"), stringsAsFactors = T)
View(DF)
glimpse(DF)
```

Looking at the data:
```{r}
ggplot(DF, aes(x = before_after, y = L)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  xlab("Light treatment") +
  ylab("Luminosity") +
  theme_bw() +
  facet_wrap()
```
